alert.note: Alert for Leake; Rankin; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 3:02AM CDT until March 26 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Leake County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Rankin County in central Mississippi... Central Scott County in central Mississippi... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 302 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Leesburg, or 10 miles northwest of Morton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ludlow around 310 AM CDT. Tuscola around 330 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lena, Walnut Grove, Redwater and Standing Pine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
